sentences.sContent: For instance they wanted me to switch to GPL or else they would find me in violation of their license.
sentences.sContent_eng: For instance they wanted me to switch to GPL or else they would find me in violation of their license.
sentences.sCn: 比如，他们想让我切换到GPL许可协议下，否则他们将认为我违反了他们的许可协议。
